extends java.lang.Object

accept

public final boolean accept(V value)
                     throws XConfigurationException
Vets the given value against this vetting group.

Parameters:
value - the value to vet
Returns:
true if all conditions in this group were satisfied; false otherwise
Throws:
XConfigurationException - if the given value is invalid, and no default value is appropriate
